text: Brian "Bryn" Jones (born 15 September 1938) is an English former professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for Barnsley and York City. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Barnsley Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Barnsley F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bryn Jones (footballer, born 1938)
